summary: This is an "addon" for the original Skyrim Immersive Creatures for those that LIKE to see mod info in the mod manager.
descriptionHtml:
This is an "addon" for the original Skyrim Immersive Creatures for those that LIKE to see mod info in the mod manager.

I'm NOT sure what the original file structure for the original file download is. Anyhow. Extract these to a temporary folder...you'll get a FOMOD and DOCS folder.

All you have to do is put the FOMOD folder into the Skyrim Immersive Creatures file. Remember... you need the FOLDER, NOT just the files in it.
author: thorne67
